name: EasyPcRecovery
tagline: Boot menu/Live OS for recovering Windows backups. Typical use case is your friend/family laptop that break twice a year!. :)
body:
### Welcome to easyPcRecovery.

For documentation go to [https://github.com/liloman/easyPcRecovery/wiki](Wiki).

Coming soon videos about the typical workflow.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
